plugins.name: Gradient Replacer
plugins.description:
Gradient Replacer


Helps you clean up your designs by converting gradients to solid colors with intelligent options. Perfect for simplifying designs, improving handoff, or meeting brand guidelines.


üöÄ Key features:


  1. Convert all gradients on a page or just selected elements
  2. Three smart conversion options:
  3. Pick from the predefined palette
  4. Use the dominant color from each gradient
  5. Choose your own custom color
  6. Batch process multiple gradients at once
  7. Preserves original opacity values
  8. Works with all gradient types (linear, radial, angular, and diamond)


üßê How to use:


  1. Select elements or leave unselected to process entire page
  2. Choose your preferred conversion method
  3. Click "Replace Gradients" to convert


Pro tip: Use the dominant color option to maintain the closest match to your original designs.

plugins.name: Doctip.me
plugins.description:
Doctip.me helps building, maintaining and managing the functional specification of a project whose requirements are driven by the UI.


Doctip.me will help you to


  1. Ensure that while documenting the interface nothing is missed and save time on back and forth between the dev team and product team
  2. Let your developers know exactly what needs to be done, and how
  3. Maintain a history of your functional specification, so you always know how an element is supposed to behave
plugins.tagline: Document your requirements right in Figma

plugins.name: FigJam Stickies Export
plugins.description:
This is a plugin for exporting FigJam data, and it has the following capabilities:

  1. It supports exporting FigJam stickies as CSV or Excel files.
  2. It supports categorizing data according to Sections.
  3. Currently, it does not support Section nesting.
  4. It supports exporting the entire file or the selection.

Come and try using this plugin! If there is anything that could be improved, you are welcome to provide your feedback!
plugins.tagline: A plugin for exporting FigJam data group by Section

plugins.name: Multi Text Edit
plugins.description:
Edit multiple text elements in a single text editor


Very helpful for bulk text editing, or ask an LLM for a list of dummy content to paste into the text editor.


Docs

  1. Update Text - each line of the text editor a selected text node in the selected X, Y, or Z order. Shortcut: press Cmd+Enter/Ctrl+Enter while in the typing to 'Update Text.'
  2. Pull Text - fills the text editor with the content of the selected text elements, so you can edit existing text and update it.
  3. Left to Right (X) - fills the leftmost text elements first. Falls back to 'Top to Bottom (Y)' if X values are equal.
  4. Top to Bottom (Y) - fills the topmost text elements first. Falls back to 'Left to Right (X)' if Y values are equal.
  5. Layer order (Z) - fills text elements in the order they appear in the Layers panel.


Tip: Precisely select nested text elements using "Ctrl+Click Drag" to draw a box through a set of text elements. See Figma Docs "Selection Marquee 4." for details.


This plugin was inspired by Multiple Text Editor's "List to Layers" functionality. You might try this other plugin if you'd like to generate random content for text elements in a similar way.


Github Repo
plugins.tagline: Edit multiple text elements in a single text editor

plugins.name: Halftone Converter
plugins.description:
This tool transforms any selected image into a customizable halftone effect, using individual ellipse layers to simulate tonal shading. You can control:


‚Ä¢Dot Size ‚Äì Adjust the diameter of each dot to refine visual granularity

‚Ä¢Dot Density ‚Äì Increase or decrease how many dots are used to represent the image


Once applied, the halftone output is placed in a Figma frame as editable ellipses, allowing for manual adjustment, recoloring, or animation. It‚Äôs ideal for designers looking to stylize artwork with a print-inspired, dot-matrix look.
plugins.tagline: Transform any image into editable halftone dots. Adjust size, density, and style directly in Figma.

plugins.name: scale_One-click adaptation to device screen
plugins.description:
This plug-in can help designers adapt their designs to devices of different sizes with one click.


1. Automatic layout adjustment:

Automatically adjust left and right and top and bottom layouts according to different size ratios

- Automatically detect horizontal or vertical layout direction

- Adjust element spacing and padding according to layout direction

- Maintain the overall structure and visual balance of the design


2. Intelligent size detection and customization:

- Analyze all design draft sizes on the current page

- Identify the most commonly used sizes and recommend them to users

- Built-in common device sizes (iPhone, iPad, Web, etc.)

- Support adding custom sizes, customizable names and sizes


3. One-click export:

After generating the manuscript, you can export all illustrations with one click and add size information to the name

- Automatically set export options, including size information

- Support batch export of all adapted design drafts

- Automatically include size information in file naming for easy management

plugins.name: Reablocks Figma Plugin
plugins.description:
Reablocks Figma Plugin

Plugin utilities to supercharge your dev work for reablocks (an open-source repo containing a set of enterprise UI components for React).


Features

CSS Token Generator: Generate Reablock-compatible JSON from Figma Style variables


CSS Token Generator Usage


Pre-requisite

You should have style created for all colors that you want to use in the project

You should use the following naming convention to assign style property to your colors

E.g.: 'Primary', 'Brand', 'Primary/100', 'Brand/title black 100'``


# Running Plugin

- Go to the Figma design file where you want to use the plugin

- Use `CMD + p` to open quick menu

- Search for new plugins using "Find More plugins option" and search for "Reablocks Figma Plugin"

- Once found, click on run plugin, it will open a popup

- Click on "Generate CSS"

- Click on "Copy CSS"

- Use the copied CSS tokens to your project


Development guide

Check the readme file @ https://github.com/reaviz/reablocks-figma-plugin/blob/main/README.md for dev contribution guidelines
plugins.tagline: Your Figma companion for Reablock

plugins.name: CSV to Variables
plugins.description:
Instantly convert CSV files to Figma variables. File name becomes the collection name, each row becomes a variable, and each column becomes a mode.


Features

  1. Import from CSV to Figma variables with modes
  2. Preview CSV content as a variables table before importing
  3. Overwrite collections with same name
  4. Create variable groups with / in the variable name
  5. Change CSV files to import
  6. Comma delimited support
  7. Western European character support
  8. Light and dark mode

plugins.name: UIDraft: Material Preview
plugins.description:
Live Web Preview for Figma

See your designs come alive in real web environments ‚Äì directly within Figma.


Functional Overview

  1. View Figma frame/group/components as they‚Äôll appear in actual browsers
  2. Auto-converts Figma styles to CSS custom properties hierarchy


How to Use

  1. Choose any frame/group/component node in your Figma file


Operational Constraints

  1. Backgrounds using Figma's CROP fill mode might display unexpected aspect ratios
  2. Complex boolean operations may simplify during web preview rendering
  3. Any layer with rotation ‚â†0¬∞ may render with unexpected alignment.
plugins.tagline: Figma to Live Web Preview in One Click: Skip Handoffs, Boost Workflow

plugins.name: Aerial
plugins.description:
Select any object, a frame, section or image. Through a bird's-eye manipulate the viewport to navigate and explore your designs.


Status:

Currently I do not have plans of making updates to this plugin.


Known Bugs/Issues:

  1. Zoom manipulation does not align with the indicator
  2. Zoom controls are mismatched
  3. Indicator position is inconsistent with drag position and zoom level
  4. Some frames or images fail to load properly


This plugin is opensource and can be found here:

https://github.com/uxmauro/figma-plugin-aerial
plugins.tagline: Zoom into your designs and have an extra birds-eye view of your work.

plugins.name: GradientForge - Free mesh gradients
plugins.description:
This tool allows you to create beautiful mesh gradients with customizable color points. You can:

  1. Add and remove color points
  2. Adjust colors using the color picker
  3. Change the aspect ratio
  4. Save your gradients as PNG files

The gradients are generated using WebGL and RBF interpolation for smooth performance and high-quality output.


Website version: https://pkolesnikov.com/meshgradients

plugins.name: Layer Duplicator Pro
plugins.description:
Layer Duplicator Pro


Layer Duplicator Pro is an innovative plugin for Figma designed to streamline the process of duplicating and modifying design layers using data from Excel spreadsheets. Whether you're managing complex design projects or iterating on prototypes, this tool enhances efficiency and accuracy by integrating structured data seamlessly into your Figma workspace.


Main Features:

  1. Effortless Integration: Import data directly from Excel into Figma to duplicate layers and apply modifications swiftly.
  2. Structured Data Handling: Manage detailed information about design layers through Excel, ensuring precise replication and edits.
  3. Visual Representation: Review and validate changes clearly within Figma, enhancing collaboration and decision-making.
  4. Enhanced Workflow: Optimize design iterations by leveraging Excel's organizational capabilities directly within Figma.


How to Use:

  1. Download Data: Extract specific details from layers into an Excel file. First, select the layer you wish to duplicate. An Excel file with the necessary structure will be automatically generated and downloaded.
  2. Import and Duplicate: Once the automatically generated Excel file has been downloaded, generate rows corresponding to each element that will be duplicated based on the selected layer. You can modify these elements by editing the corresponding columns in the Excel file. Layer Duplicator Pro will automatically adjust the indicated parameters and create a duplicated layer with the desired dimensions.
  3. Review Results: Efficiently validate changes and errors through intuitive visual feedback within Figma.


Benefits:

  1. Increased Productivity: Simplify complex design tasks and accelerate project timelines.
  2. Improved Collaboration: Foster better teamwork by visualizing changes and updates clearly.
  3. Streamlined Processes: Eliminate manual duplication efforts and streamline iterative design workflows.


Next Steps:

Explore how Layer Duplicator Pro can revolutionize your design process by integrating structured data seamlessly from Excel into Figma. Enhance productivity and creativity with a tool designed to simplify and elevate your design workflow.
plugins.tagline: Duplicate, resize, edit text & images swiftly in Figma for streamlined design workflows.

plugins.name: DesignDetox
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma experience with DesignDetox ‚Äì the ultimate tool for decluttering and optimizing your design workspace. Our plugin is engineered to enhance the efficiency of designers by providing a swift and seamless way to manage and organize your Figma files.


Key Features:

  • Detach Instances and Components: Simplify your designs by detaching all instances and components with just a click. Perfect for finalizing designs or preparing files for handoff.
  • Remove Auto-Layouts: Instantly strip away auto-layout properties from selected frames, allowing for more flexible manipulation and customization of your designs.
  • Eliminate Hidden Layers: Clean up your workspace by removing all hidden layers from the entire page. A great way to reduce file size and improve manageability.


DesignDetox is more than just a plugin; it's your personal assistant for maintaining a clean and efficient design environment. With its intuitive interface and powerful features, DesignDetox is an indispensable tool for every Figma user looking to enhance productivity and focus on creativity.


Easy to Use:

  • Simple, user-friendly interface with clear, actionable buttons.
  • Real-time updates on the count of instances/components, auto-layout frames, and hidden layers in your project.
  • Instant notifications provide feedback on actions taken for transparency and control.


Whether you're a seasoned designer or just starting out, DesignDetox helps you maintain a clutter-free workspace, enabling you to focus on what truly matters ‚Äì creating stunning designs. Try DesignDetox today and experience a cleaner, more efficient design process in Figma!

accepted.description: Design Systems | Product Designer | Mentor | Figma Fan | UX Strategist

plugins.name: Place inside!
plugins.description:
How many times have you realised that the objects you are working on are not inside the art board? How many times have you missed some elements in the art board while exporting or playing prototype?


This plugin is the solution to all these issues. It will check if there are any objects staying outside of frames and nest them inside if they are directly above the frame. The position of the object remains intact.
plugins.tagline: Nest objects lying outside of artboards inside. No more floating layers!

plugins.name: Clean layers
plugins.description:
With Clean layers, you're able to find unnamed layers, components, and stray instances (which are component instances that no longer have a parent component), helping you maintain a clean file that's properly organized and synced.


This makes your design workflow smoother and ensures your files are easy to navigate and collaborate on.
plugins.tagline: A Figma plugin that helps clean up your layers and components.

plugins.description:
Colorgen ‚Äì Your Ultimate Color Toolkit for Figma


This is my first plugin! Transform your Figma workflow with Colorgen, the all-in-one plugin designed for modern creators who want vibrant and versatile color solutions. Whether you‚Äôre looking to create harmonious palettes, stunning gradients, or nuanced color scales, Colorgen makes it easy. Plus, enjoy an engaging HSL color game to challenge and sharpen your color skills.


üåà Key Features:


  1. Effortless Palette & Gradient Generation: Generate inspiring palettes and gradients with just a click.
  2. Interactive Color Application: Apply any generated color directly to your selected frames for seamless integration.
  3. Add to Canvas: Instantly add custom palettes and gradient scales to your Figma canvas for easy reference and use.
  4. HSL Color Game: Have fun and test your color-matching skills with a built-in color game.
  5. User-Friendly Design: Simple controls that enhance your creative process without complexity.


Elevate your design projects with Colorgen and make color exploration fun, intuitive, and impactful. Please provide feedback and any additional feature enhancements.

  3. Thinking about adding color palettes from images!

plugins.name: Shopdev: Figma to Shopify Liquid
plugins.description:
Figma to Shopify Liquid

Turn any Figma design into responsive Liquid code that‚Äôs ready to publish to your Shopify theme with the Shopdev Figma plugin. Select your frame in Figma, import it into Shopdev, and deploy in a few clicks, no coding required.


How it works

  1. Open the plugin: Launch the plugin directly within your Figma design file.
  2. Select the frame: Choose any frame, like a hero, banner, testimonial, or promo section.
  3. Click ‚ÄúImport frame‚Äù: The plugin automatically transfers your selected design to shopdev.ai.
  4. Customize prompt (Optional): You‚Äôll see a pre-filled prompt ‚ÄúBuild this Figma import‚Äù; you have the option to add extra input if desired (e.g., "Use a slider for the images on mobile").
  5. Submit the prompt: Shopdev will generate responsive Liquid code you can preview.
  6. Edit and iterate: Continue prompting shopdev to refine your design until it‚Äôs perfect.
  7. Publish: Click to deploy directly to your Shopify theme.


Support

For additional support using this plugin, ask questions in the Shopdev Discord channel.


Tips for best results: Use Auto Layout

Auto Layout isn‚Äôt required, but it helps the AI better understand your design‚Äôs structure and spacing. Using it can lead to more accurate imports with less additional prompting needed, especially for responsive layouts.


From Figma to Shopify with the help of Shopdev, an AI Shopify developer

With the Shopdev Figma plugin, you can convert any static Figma design into live, editable Shopify theme sections, ideal for:

  1. Homepage sections like banners, product features, testimonials, or value props
  2. Landing page sections that can be reused across multiple campaigns
  3. PDP add-ons like trust badges, comparison charts, or upsell modules
  4. Reusable content blocks that can be dragged and dropped across templates
  5. Custom sections for any part of your store without needing a developer


Shopdev automatically interprets your Figma design and generates responsive Liquid code that works natively within Shopify‚Äôs theme system. You can edit the output manually or continue refining it through prompts.
plugins.tagline: Use AI to turn any Figma design into Shopify-ready Liquid code

plugins.name: Creatup: Mark creator name
plugins.description:
üí´ The plugin allows you to track the creation date and creator by putting this information in the name of sections, frames, groups, components or pages.


How it works:

On startup, the plugin substitutes the actual date and the name of the plugin user who started the plugin into the names of selected layers. When the plugin is run again, the date and name are changed to current.


What's it add?

  1. Day ‚Ä¢ Month ‚Ä¢ Year
  2. Full user name
  3. Tag: UPD (Update)


This all speeds up the search for layers, use the keyboard shortcut "Command + F" / "Ctrl + /" for quick searches.


Why?

The plugin serves to organize the working environment in large teams and has an accumulative effect. If you start using it now, you will be able to track your entire design history in the future.
plugins.tagline: Mark the date and the creator's in layers, frames and sections names

plugins.name: Translized
plugins.description:
About Translized

Jumpstart your software localization journey right from the design phase with Translized‚Äôs Figma plugin. This tool empowers you to integrate translations directly into your UI designs within Figma. You can also upload your translation terms from Figma into Translized, streamlining your workflow and ensuring timely completion of the localization process (leveraging both human and machine translation).

Avoid common pitfalls like translations disrupting your UI layout. Provide your translators with the context they need through integrated screenshots. Explore more at translized.com.

Features:

  • Easy Translation Uploads: Transfer your translation terms from Figma straight to Translized.
  • Live UI Visualization: See your translations come to life within your Figma UI designs.
  • Contextual Clarity for Translators: Enhance translation accuracy with context-providing screen uploads.
  • Consistent Naming Conventions: Establish key names for your translation terms, bridging your copy, design, and code seamlessly.

Getting Started with Translized in Figma:

  1. Open Your Project
  2. Install the Plugin: Head over to the Plugins section and install the Translized plugin.
  3. Link Your Account: Provide your API Access Token (found under Account/API Access) to link your Translized account. If you don‚Äôt have an account yet, sign up for free at translized.com.
  4. Prepare Your Texts: In Figma, select your texts. Check and modify key names as needed, and then upload them to Translized.
  5. Select Project and Language: Finalize your upload by choosing the appropriate project and language.
  6. Upload Screenshots: (Available on the Premium plan) Ensure to check ‚ÄòUpload screenshots‚Äô for added context in translations.
  7. Translate on Translized: Utilize machine translation, professional human translation services, or manually translate your content on the Translized platform.
  8. Pull Translations into Figma: Use the ‚ÄòPull Translations‚Äô tab to select your project and language. This action will create a new page in Figma with all texts translated into the selected language.

Need more guidance? Visit our comprehensive documentation page for detailed instructions.


Contact us through email: info@translized.com if you need any assistance.
plugins.tagline: Add translations from & to your design easily

plugins.name: Bulk image exporter
plugins.description:
Speed up your workflow by exporting all images from your Figma page in just one click! This plugin collects every image and packs them into a handy ZIP file ‚Äî no more exporting one by one.


You can also set a size limit (default: 1MB) to automatically compress images without losing too much quality. Perfect for quick exporting, sharing assets with devs and optimizing performance.


Features:


  1. Export all images on the current page in a ZIP file
  2. Set max size per image (e.g. 1MB or less)
  3. Check the current download status.
  4. Download each image individually


üëâ Please note: this plugin is currently in beta, feedback is welcome!
